name: glyptodon
title: Glyptodon
desc: A minimal, modern fluid theme with mesh gradients for personal writing and portfolios.
article:
A personal website theme with soft, engaging gradients in cold winter colors, perfect for a personal blog or a portfolio displaying your work. Light and dark modes are shown based on the user's system preferences.


I've used newer CSS techniques to resize the text and grids dynamically and fluidly based on any screen size. If you'd like a different color scheme, I've included notes with tools to find a good palette and ensure the text colors are legible and accessible.


You can demo this site at https://glyptodon-demo.netlify.app/ or my website, which uses a modified version of the theme, at http://www.timeaton.dev.
